akn:section.akn:heading: Depot-level activities of the Department of Defense: authority to compete for maintenance and repair

akn:content.akn:p: § 2470. Depot-level activities of the Department of Defense: authority to compete for maintenance and repair workloads of other Federal agencies A depot-level activity of the Department of Defense shall be eligible to compete for the performance of any depot-level maintenance and repair workload of a Federal agency for which competitive procedures are used to select the entity to perform the workload. (Added Pub. L. 103–337, div. A, title III, § 335(a), Oct. 5, 1994, 108 Stat. 2716.)
